summary: GENTURIX Platform Hardening - Comprehensive multi-role testing completed. All 7 roles tested (SuperAdmin, Admin, Supervisor, Guard, Resident, HR, Student). Fixed critical bug in SuperAdmin dashboard where navigate was not passed to OverviewTab component. All navigation, forms, buttons, and logout functionality working correctly across all roles.

features_verified: Dashboard loads with stats (19 Condominios, 72 Usuarios, $67 MRR, 41 Alertas)
Tabs work: Resumen, Condominios, Usuarios, Contenido
Nuevo Condominio button navigates to /super-admin/onboarding (FIXED)
Onboarding wizard loads with 5 steps
Logout works via header icon
SuperAdmin.bug_fixed: navigate prop was not passed to OverviewTab component - fixed by adding navigate prop

features_verified: Dashboard loads with welcome message and stats
Sidebar navigation: Dashboard, Usuarios, Seguridad, Recursos Humanos, Pagos, Reservaciones, Auditoría, Configuración
User Management: 41 users, create user form works
Security Module: Panic buttons, alerts list, access registry
RRHH Module: Employee list, shift planning, tabs work
Reservations: Area list, create area form works
Audit: Event log with filters and export
Logout works via sidebar 'Cerrar Sesión'
Redirects to RRHH module
Sidebar with Dashboard, Seguridad, Recursos Humanos
Employee list visible
Logout works

desktop_features: 8 tabs: Alertas, Check-In, Mi Turno, Ausencias, Visitas, Historial, Personas, Perfil
Alertas tab: Shows active alerts with badge count
Check-In tab: Search input, manual entry button
Mi Turno tab: Clock in/out buttons (disabled when no shift)
mobile_features: Bottom navigation: Alertas, Check-In, Pánico, Mi Turno, Perfil
Profile shows user info with Edit button

features_verified: 5 tabs: Emergencia, Visitas, Mis Alertas, Personas, Perfil
Emergencia tab: 3 panic buttons (Médica, Sospechosa, General), Llamar 911
Visitas tab: Authorization list with color-coded badges, Nueva Autorización form
Personas tab: Directory grouped by role
Mis Alertas tab: Sent alerts history
Perfil tab: User info with Edit button
Logout works via header icon
Stats: Empleados, Activos, Turnos Hoy, Ausencias
9 tabs for HR functions
Employee list with status badges
Nuevo Turno button visible
Logout works via sidebar
Stats: Inscritos, Completados, Certificados
4 tabs: Cursos, Plan, Avisos, Perfil
Course list with Inscribirse buttons
Profile with stats
Logout works

critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: SuperAdminDashboard.js - OverviewTab component was using navigate without receiving it as prop. Added navigate prop to component signature and usage.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 7 roles tested and working. SuperAdmin navigate bug was fixed. Platform is stable for all user types. Mobile navigation tested for Guard role. All forms, buttons, navigation, and logout functionality verified working.

cross_role_verification.navigation_dead_ends: None found - all pages have working navigation
cross_role_verification.modal_closability: All modals can be closed via Cancel/X buttons
cross_role_verification.logout_accessibility: Logout accessible from every page for all roles
